name: David Garland
text: It's good pizza overall, but we haven't once had our order correct. Sometimes is the crust not being seasoned. Others it's not cut completely. The garlic knot pizza we got had a total of 10 knots on the whole thing. It makes me sad because their pizza tastes really good when its properly.

name: gene robinette jr
text: Its..  Ok. The thin crust cheese pizza is mediocre but good

name: Luna Rayne
text: 3rd time I’ve gotten a call saying they don’t have certain items and now machinery is down. It’s the 1/3 places in this town that delivers and I’m not impressed. But will say deliveries is on point timing 3/5 stars

name: Harry McAllister
text: Had one poor guy working there at the time! And he did it all! He was the host,waiter,cook,cashier and busboy and did it all excellently! And the pizza was great ! The man needs a medal !

name: j he
text: The pizza was great and my wife our grandbaby and me went there today on 3/14/2020 at like 130pm and this place was a ghost town. There was nobody else there except 2 employees but food was great

name: Amber Andrews
text: Pizza would be amazing if everytime we got our food it wasn't missing something. No garlic or cheese on the crusts 3 times now. Well shame on us for hoping for change.
